articles.description: Utah has broken its single-day new cases record for the second day in a row, but health officials are cautioning against jumping to conclusions.
articles.content:
SALT LAKE CITY Utah has broken its COVID-19 single-day new cases record for the second day in a row, but health officials are cautioning against jumping to conclusions.
